snippet: Oregon Tech won the N.A.I.A. Division II championship Tuesday, giving Coach Danny Miles his 971st victory and perhaps his best one, considering the team has been dealing with the suicide of one of its players.
abstract: Oregon Tech won the N.A.I.A. Division II championship Tuesday, giving Coach Danny Miles his 971st victory and perhaps his best one, considering the team has been dealing with the suicide of one of its players.

headline.main: Oregon Tech, Miles Celebrate Championship Tinged by Tragedy
